definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Be familiar with the procedure of wooden and metal frames.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉木相架，金属相架的工艺流程。

sentences.english: Be familiar with the procedure of wooden and metal frames.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉木相架，金属相架的工艺流程。

sentences.english: I went to a little black shelf that held a small picture of the most beautiful woman I had ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 我向那个上面放着一个漂亮女子小照片的相架走去。

sentences.english: Folds the stone high about six meters, puts up by two big stones becomes.
sentences.chinese: 叠石高大约六米，由两块大石相架而成。

sentences.english: Days before we went to supermarket, and we bought toothpaste so we got a hearts photofame.
sentences.chinese: 日前去超市，我地买左牙膏所以有相架送。
